cast.name: 奥提格·帕克斯 Otig Pakis
埃米尔·库苏莫 Emil Kusumo

director.name: 鲁迪·索德甲渥 Rudy Soedjarwo

introduction: Desta was born in the happy family. However, happiness in the family did not last long when a shipment of witchcraft led to the death of both parents. Desta grow up to be a loner and full of mystery. His desire for revenge made him seek the mastermind behind the death of his parents. Along Desta search in finding the killer of his parents, Desta were met by a group of teenagers who also has a special power like himself. Witchcraft war began to dominate Desta life when knowing the murder of his parents. In the end, Desta should choose to satisfy the lust of revenge or choose another way which is more civilized.
